title: Cod with lemon and capers
description: Cod and potatoes, always good together, are given extra bite, oven-baked with a sprinkling of sugar to crisp the potatoes, and served with a butter, lemon and caper sauce.
ingredients: 1 medium potato, such as maris piper, peeled, thinly sliced into rounds
700g/1Â½ lbs cod, or white fish, cut into 8 pieces
salt and freshly ground black pepper
